attribs.name: multiattack
attribs.current: Valtess Nox make two Longsword attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_actions_2_effect
attribs.current: Automatically pass a saving throw after a failure.

attribs.name: legendary_actions_display
attribs.current: The Valtess-nox can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Valtess-nox regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction-l_-K9K1ZAA0k20VbAbMZIc_description
attribs.current: Make an additional longsword attack. (1 LA)

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction-l_-K9K2t828dESmyE4CSGQ_description
attribs.current: Every creature within a 15 ft radius is dealt [[4d6]] cold damage or half damage on a DC 15 DEX save. (3LA)
